title: How to Make Albert Squares

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to moderate heat (180ºC/350ºF).
Cream the butter and sugar together.
Add the eggs.
steps.description: Add them one at a time, beating well.

steps.headline: Add remaining ingredients to the mixture.
Pour the mixture into the pan that has been lined with baking paper.
Take out from the oven and let cool.
Ice.
steps.description: Ice using a plain white icing.

text: Preheat the oven to moderate heat (180ºC/350ºF).  Cream the butter and sugar together.  Add the eggs. Add them one at a time, beating well. Add remaining ingredients to the mixture. Combine well. Pour the mixture into the pan that has been lined with baking paper.  Place in the oven. Bake for 30–40 minutes. Take out from the oven and let cool.  Ice. Ice using a plain white icing. Sprinkle with desiccated coconut.  Finished.
